PTHREAD_SELF(3) Library Functions Manual PTHREAD_SELF(3)

NAME

pthread_self — get the calling thread's ID

SYNOPSIS

#include <pthread.h>

pthread_t
pthread_self(void);

DESCRIPTION

The pthread_self() function returns the thread ID of the calling thread.

RETURN VALUES

The pthread_self() function returns the thread ID of the calling thread.

ERRORS

None.

SEE ALSO

pthread_create(3), pthread_equal(3)

STANDARDS

The pthread_self() function conforms to ISO/IEC 9945-1:1996 (“POSIX.1”).

April 4, 1996 macOS 14.3
